sn55.33:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.33:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako dhamme … pe …
sn55.33:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
sn55.33:6.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā”ti.
